column5: Are any of the vendors selling LARGE muskie sized spinnerbaits?  I am thinking of Grim Reapers and others that size and up.   JBs hasn't had any in stock for a while.
JB's has the 950 Grim Reapers in now Raf for $20 with a pretty good color selection.  He's also got some of the HUGE Beavers too......$45.......I think.
Thank you Lew, I've been trying to find them locally for a while now.  Wallet's going to take a beating.
I think Lew should be on the Spring Fishing Show payrol.  He is helping everyone here.  my 2 cents  2many
